hero.title: Meet every month
hero.description: Round4 connects four local entrepreneurs every month for a sports activity. No formal networking events, but real connections, with substance and fun.

how.title: Every month.

step1.title: 1. Automatic match
step1.description: We connect you every month with three entrepreneurs from your area. Local and accessible.

step2.title: 2. Plan your activity
step2.description: You schedule a sports activity together. Walking, boxing, padel, it doesn't matter.

step3.title: 3. Share experiences
step3.description: After sports: coffee, beer, pizza and real conversations. Entrepreneurs who help each other grow.

step4.title: 4. Next round
step4.description: At the end of the month, the group chat disappears and it starts all over again.

how.tagline: Active together, grow together — that's Round4

benefits.title: Sports
benefits.bullet3: A sports activity and a good conversation
benefits.bullet4: You don't have to prove yourself. You don't have to sell anything.
benefits.bullet5: For entrepreneurs who grow by sharing.

voorWie.title: For entrepreneurs
voorWie.paragraph1: Not for people with business cards, but for entrepreneurs, founders, freelancers, builders and creatives — between 25 and 40 years old — who want to stay sharp and aren't afraid of a bit of sweat and a good conversation.
voorWie.paragraph2: For entrepreneurs who don't want to network for the sake of it, but to really get to know each other. You don't have to pitch at Round4. You don't have to prove yourself. You just come as you are. With your ideas, doubts, challenges and successes.
voorWie.paragraph3: Are you willing to go offline for a while, so you make room for real conversations?

licht.desc: Ideal for getting to know each other and a good conversation.

sociaal.desc: Not the sports performance, but a game element.

pricing.title: Simple and transparent
pricing.subtitle: Monthly membership – cancel anytime
pricing.feature3: Be part of a new networking revolution
pricing.note: Activity costs are at your own expense and choice.

testfase.title: Round4 starts in Utrecht
testfase.paragraph1: We're starting with a pilot in Utrecht. The first 50 entrepreneurs will be divided into groups of four. If you're in, you'll build from day one. No waiting attitude. No spectators. Only doers.

roadmap.title: More value as the community grows
roadmap.subtitle: Specific matching once your city has 250+ members
roadmap.phase1: Phase 1: Local matching on availability & sport.
roadmap.phase2: Phase 2: More specific matching on industry, revenue level and growth stage.

q1.question: How do we plan the activity?
q1.answer: You choose the place and time yourselves. We provide inspiration lists and handy checklists.

q2.question: What if I'm unavailable?
q2.answer: You can swap or skip a month – your membership continues.

q3.question: Can I participate less often?
q3.answer: Yes, monthly, every other month or quarterly. You decide the rhythm.

q4.question: Who pays for the activity?
q4.answer: You yourselves, fitting your preference and budget. Free options are also possible (walking, city walk).

q5.question: What about privacy?
q5.answer: We only use your data for matching. We don't share anything with third parties.
